Package edu.cs495.engine.game.satcollision

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Collidable
    Classes which implement Collidable have collision logic to determine whether a collision exists and in which way
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CollisionEvent
    This models the result of a collision and provides useful information to the invoked physical object
    SATCircle
    This class models the data requires to make SAT physics calculations for circles
    SATCollisionComponent
    An SAT collision component adds collision detection.
    SATPolygon
    A polygon defined by a list of vectors.
    SATVector
    This class models the information needed to interpret a vector as part of a polygon used in SAT Collision
